title: "PGA Tour tees up ‘transformational partnership’ with Amazon Web Services"
excerpt: "The PGA Tour has become the latest major sports property to partner with Amazon Web Services (AWS) as part of a wide-ranging deal that will see the cloud computing giant bring its artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) capabilities to the world’s leading professional golf circuit."
